document_data.name: Winter Zulth
document_data.mainbody: '''Winter Zulth''' was a [[half-elf]] living in [[Waterdeep]] and the regional agent of the [[Moonstars]] for non-[[Faer√ªn]]ian locations in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Winter was raised in Waterdeep and worked at the [[Horizon's Sails]] as a [[map]]-maker. He used his position for the Moonstars' cause by collating  maps and logbooks from exotic places like [[Zakhara]], [[Maztica]], and [[Kara-Tur]] and producing unique maps that were extremely valuable to explorers and navigators. He could also provide a ship for the Moonstar's needs upon request.
